params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize FlavaTextConfig.

params.name: image_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize FlavaImageConfig.

params.name: multimodal_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize FlavaMultimodalConfig.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of text and image projection layers.

params.name: logit_scale_init_value
params.description: The initial value of the logit_scale parameter. Default is used as per the original FLAVA/CLIPimplementation.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: mim_weight
params.description: Weight to be assigned to MIM (Masked Image Modeling) unimodal loss

params.name: mlm_weight
params.description: Weight to be assigned to MLM (Masked Language Modeling) unimodal loss

params.name: global_contrastive_weight
params.description: Weight to be assigned to global contrastive cross-alignment loss.

params.name: itm_weight
params.description: Weight to be assigned to image-text matching multimodal loss.

params.name: mmm_image_weight
params.description: Weight to be assigned to MMM losss image part.

params.name: mmm_text_weight
params.description: Weight to be assigned to MMM losss text part.

params.name: global_backprop_contrastive
params.description: Whether to use global backpropgation through all workers in contrastive loss.

params.name: skip_unmasked_multimodal_encoder
params.description: Whether to skip running unmasked multimodal encoder whose outputs are not used by FLAVA losses.

params.name: return_loss
params.description: Whether to return loss or not
